channel.title: Comments on: BM College ComfortBlend fleece

item.title: By: Maria
item.dc:creator: Maria
item.description: I love grey hoodies! This is perfect with my grey BM College shirt, when I get cold I throw this on and I can still be a Ninja.
item.content:encoded: I love grey hoodies! This is perfect with my grey BM College shirt, when I get cold I throw this on and I can still be a Ninja.

item.title: By: Andrew
item.dc:creator: Andrew
item.description: I bought this thinking it was a nice green colour, apparently it GREY! I'm colour blind so I don't care but my girlfriend says grey makes me look fat
item.content:encoded: I bought this thinking it was a nice green colour, apparently it GREY! I’m colour blind so I don’t care but my girlfriend says grey makes me look fat
